goal.ch: 這門課, 我將和修課同學討論多元化的數學主題
goal.en: In this course, I will discuss any mathematics topic with students

outline.ch:
(1) college mathematics, for example: calculus, linear algebra, discrete mathematics, algebra, orthogonal polynomials.
(2) graduated mathematics, for example: algebraic graph theory, algebraic combinatorics, semi-simple algebra, free algebra.
(3) research level, for example: Terwilliger algebra, DAHA, Askey-Wilson algebra.
outline.en:
(1) college mathematics, for example: calculus, linear algebra, discrete mathematics, algebra, orthogonal polynomials.
(2) graduated mathematics, for example: algebraic graph theory, algebraic combinatorics, semi-simple algebra, free algebra.
(3) research level, for example: Terwilliger algebra, DAHA, Askey-Wilson algebra.

flexDiscription.ch: 每位學生要找尋自己感興趣 的文獻. 預期要花費至少8小時.
flexDiscription.en: Each student searches the literatures they are interested in. I predict that It will take at least 8 hours.

ch: 系所:限數學系碩士班、數學系博士班。
en: Department:MSc in Mathematics、PhD in Mathematics only.
